content.event: Virtual Serverless Hackathon
content.description: The λ# Hackathon is part workshop, part challenge, part competition, and always a rush!
content.organizer: λ# - All Things Serverless and AWS Lambda

content.event: Online HandsOn Workshop: Knative 101
content.description: Knative is a new open source project that’s generating a lot of excitement in the Kubernetes and Serverless communities. It’s a great fit for application developers.

content.event: AWS Serverless Immersion Day for Startups
content.description: In this workshop, you learn about the spectrum of serverless services in the AWS cloud. You will get hands-on and use these services to create a new unicorn from scratch.

content.event: How Cuelogic is helping realize rapid release velocity, leveraging cloud native & serverless technologies on AWS
content.description: Join us as we talk about an actual use case to help a business bring agility and increase development throughput by seamlessly implementing Cloud Native & Serverless.

content.event: Sessions with SAM
content.description: Sessions with SAM returns "The Step Functions episode". Featuring Eric Johnson and Rob Sutter.

content.event: Deploy a Web App in Minutes using Serverless Technologies - Cloud Run
content.description: During this workshop, all attendees will have their own dedicated environment and they will learn how to deploy a web app using Serverless Technologies like Cloud Run and Pub/Sub.

content.event: Arquitecturas Serverless 101
content.description: Arquitecturas Serverless 101 es nuestra segunda edición y estamos orgullosos. Te queremos invitar a esta increíble charla donde desglosaremos este concepto y su aplicación en nubes públicas.

content.event: Construyendo una aplicación Serverless con AWS
content.description: ¡Debido al enorme interés en profundizar en AWS Serverless, tendremos una sesión enfocada en desarrollo!

content.event: Serverless computing on IBM Cloud
content.description: “Serverless” is such a buzzword that's highly misunderstood. Will serverless kill containers? Does serverless mean no servers? Is serverless cost effective? What is serverless good for?

content.event: Serverless computing on IBM Cloud
content.description: “Serverless” is such a buzzword that's highly misunderstood. Will serverless kill containers? Does serverless mean no servers? Is serverless cost effective? What is serverless good for?

content.event: Using Fission for fast and simple functions on Kubernetes
content.description: Let's understand "Fission" from the person who has built it from the ground up. How to implement Serverless Functions in Kubernetes.

content.event: Don't use Lambda to move data, API Gateway can help!
content.description: Don't use Lambda to move data, API Gateway can help! International Speaker: Richard Fan, AWS DeepRacer Finalist, from Hong Kong.

content.event: Parallel Python and Server-less web applications
content.description: A first online meetup will be held for Lithuania's Python community! Of course, everyone is welcome to join since the presentations will be in the English language.

content.event: Build an Alexa Skill using Serverless
content.description: Join us for this Hands on workshop and learn how to automate what senior management do by building skills for home assistants.

content.event: Cost and performance optimization strategies for AWS Lambda
content.description: This session will dive into the best practices for tuning memory, runtime, initialization, concurrency, and more, in a data-driven way, to squeeze every drop of performance out of Lambda functions.

content.event: Migration to Aurora Serverless
content.description: Migration to Aurora Serverless 2 weeks after the GA release, and watching it scale from ~1000 IOPS to over 2 500 000 IOPS.

content.event: AWS Lambda & Amazon API Gateway
content.description: 23 Haziran çarşamba akşamı bu sefer geleneksel API geliştirme yöntemlerinin dışına çıkarak, AWS'in sunucusuz servisleri Lambda ve API Gateway hakkında konuşuyor olacağız.

content.event: Serverless Security Strategies: Under the Hood
content.description: AWS Senior Principal Engineers Becky Weiss and Marc Brooker discuss how security strategies have changed to support modern application and how serverless security is applied under the hood.

content.event: Implementare Stateful pattern con le Azure Functions
content.description: Ed eccoci tornati in ambito programmazione dove parleremo di come Implementare lo Stateful pattern con le Azure Functions.

content.event: Workshop MEAN & Serverless
content.description: Durante a palestra, estarei falando sobre como podemos definir uma arquitetura altamente escalável usando Node.js com Azure Functions baseado numa arquitetura Serverless.

content.event: Serverless Series - PART 3
content.description: We're doing a 3 part series on building a serverless application. We're going to build a serverless mock of https://medium.com. Part 3 we will see how much this will cost at scale.

content.event: Deploy ML models in Azure Functions: Python & TensorFlow
content.description: In this session,participant will learn how to use Python, TensorFlow, and Azure Functions with a machine learning model to classify an image based on its contents.

content.event: AWS Serverless Community Day Australia & New Zealand
content.description: AWS Serverless Community Day Australia & New Zealand is a community led event focused on sharing experiences, building applications and using serverless architectures.

content.description:

content.event: ServerlessDays Paris - Remote Session #3
content.description: Want to join the serverless hype train but you’re stuck with your legacy PHP application? During this session, we gathered top tier experts to ensure you’ll be flawlessly able to initiate a migration.

content.event: AWS Amplify Days
content.description: Register for a two day exploration of full stack cloud development with AWS Amplify, a set of tools and services to build secure, scalable cloud-powered mobile and web applications.

content.event: ServerlessDays Hamburg
content.description: ServerlessDays Hamburg is a 2-day conference about Serverless technologies with one day of workshops and one day with talks.
